Trump Tawarkan Bantuan ke Meksiko Memerangi Kartel Narkoba
06 Nov 2019, 01:31 by AFP, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Presiden Amerika Serikat Donald Trump. (AFP Photo/Timothy A. Clary)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Presiden Amerika Serikat (AS) Donald Trump mendesak Meksiko 'berperang' dengan bantuan pihaknya terhadap kartel-kartel narkoba yang dipercaya telah menyerang kelompok Mormon di utara Meksiko dan menewaskan sembilan orang. "Bila Meksiko membutuhkan atau meminta bantuan untuk membersihkan monster ini, AS siap, mau dan mampu terlibat dan melakukannya dengan cepat dan efektif," kata Trump melalui akun Twitter.



Dilansir dari AFP, penyerangan itu dikatakan terjadi pada Senin (4/11) di Rancho de la Mora di area dekat perbatasan antara Sonora dan Chihuahua. Area itu dikenal merupakan jalur lintas narkoba dan bandit.Seorang warga bernama Julian Lebaron memberi tahu kepada media Formula Radio di Meksiko bahwa keponakannya yang sedang menuju ke bandara dengan empat orang anak diserang di dalam mobil. Mobil itu kemudian dibakar saat mereka masih di dalam.Mayat seorang perempuan serta anak laki-laki dan perempuan ditemukan di dua mobil lainnya. Setidaknya lima anak lainnya bisa melarikan diri, kata Lebaron.Trump mengatakan Presiden Meksiko Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador telah berperang dengan kartel narkoba. Namun Trump bilang kartel narkoba itu telah menjadi sangat besar dan kuat hingga membutuhkan tentara untuk mengalahkan tentara."Ini adalah waktu buat Meksiko, dengan bantuan AS, untuk berperang pada kartel narkoba dan memusahkannya dari muka bumi. Kami hanya menunggu panggilan dari presiden baru Anda yang hebat!" kata Trump. (fea)

Trump Offers Help to Mexico Fighting Drug Cartels
06 Nov 2019, 01:31 by AFP, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


United States President Donald Trump. (AFP Photo / Timothy A. Clary)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - President of the United States (US) Donald Trump has urged Mexico to 'fight' with its help with drug cartels believed to have attacked the Mormon group in northern Mexico and killed nine people. "If Mexico needs or asks for help to clean this monster, the US is ready, willing and able to get involved and do it quickly and effectively," Trump said through his Twitter account.



Reporting from AFP, the attack was said to have taken place on Monday (4/11) in Rancho de la Mora in an area near the border between Sonora and Chihuahua. The area is known to be a drug and bandit trafficking route. A resident named Julian Lebaron told Formula Radio media in Mexico that his nephew who was heading to the airport with four children was attacked in a car. The car was then burned while they were still inside. The life of a woman as well as a boy and a girl were found in two other cars. At least five other children could escape, said Lebaron. Trump said Mexican President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador had fought a drug cartel. But Trump said the drug cartel had become so big and strong that it needed troops to defeat the army. "This is the time for Mexico, with US assistance, to fight the drug cartel and make it difficult from the face of the earth. great!" Trump said. (fea)
